DOC.brief_summary: A Randomized , Open-label , Single-dose , Two-way Crossover Clinical Trial Investigate Pharmacokinetics Safety/Tolerability Combination Gemigliptin/Metformin HCl Sustained Release 50/2000 mg ( 25/1000 mg x 2 tablet ) Comparison Each Component Gemigliptin 50 mg Metformin HCl Extended Release 2000 mg ( 1000 mg x 2 tablet ) Administered Healthy Male Volunteers .
DOC.brief_title: BE Study Combinations Gemigliptin 50mg Metformin HCl Extended Release 2000mg Comparison Each Component Administered Alone
